name: college-employment-survey-v1
description: 大学生就业问卷调查平台 V1 - 基于现代化技术栈的重构版本

scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter frontend test && pnpm --filter backend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter frontend lint:fix && pnpm --filter backend lint:fix
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter frontend type-check && pnpm --filter backend type-check
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && pnpm deploy:frontend && pnpm deploy:backend
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter frontend clean && pnpm --filter backend clean

author: V1 Development Team
